info.name: sinchew.com.my ad removed....让所有恼人的广告滚开。
info.description:
Removed all advertisement bar.

只看你想要看的内容！

...让所有恼人的广告滚开。

style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("sinchew.com.my")

{
div[id="footer"],
div[class="left-400x200-ads"],
img [src*="Ads"],
img [src*="banner"],
table[width="400"],
table[width="728"],
iframe [src*="ads"],
div[class="logoHTop"],
div[id="otp-ads"],
div[class="shenghuotieshi"],
iframe[src*="adtext"],
div[class="block block-block"][id="block-block-11"]
{display:none !important}

/*script*/
a[href*="googlesyndication.com"] img, *[src*="googlesyndication.com"],
a[href*="http://www.sinchew-i.com/phpAdsNew/"] img, *[src*="http://www.sinchew-i.com/phpAdsNew/"],
a[href*="phpAdsNew"] img, *[src*="phpAdsNew"],
a[href*="globe7"] img, *[src*="globe7"],
a[href*="avn.innity.com"] img, *[src*="avn.innity.com"],
a[href*="ad.doubleclick.net"] img, *[src*="ad.doubleclick.net"]
{display:none !important}
}
